text: Alfred "Uganda" Roberts (April 8, 1943 â€“ May 5, 2020) was an American conga- percussion player. She was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. As a young musician he performed with Professor Longhair. He would continue to work with until Longhair's death. He also performed with Dr. John. Roberts died in New Orleans on May 5, 2020 of lung cancer, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * Discography * Ogden Museum * NOIMC Innovation Award Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American jazz musicians Category:American funk musicians Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Musicians from New Orleans
title: Alfred "Uganda" Roberts
